column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Went here for dinner on Saturday 10/18 with my sisters
column2: one who is vegan and the other who is vegetarian. We had the seasonal apple cider sangria
column3: which was amazing. We were told that it's smart to order 3-4 tapas per person
column4: but we wanted to get the farmer's market paella (2 servings) to share
column5: so we ordered 4 tapas total & the paella. it was a little too much food
column6: but everything was delicious. We got the stuffed mushrooms
column8: garlic & arugula & roasted vegetables- my favorite was the stuffed mushrooms. I also got the mini-tapa stuffed date w/chorizo- delicious. could have eaten 10 of them. Will definitely be back to try some of the meat dishes!
